table.name: its4you_googlesync4you_access
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_googlesync4you_access` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `google_login` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `google_password` varchar(255) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_googlesync4you_calendar
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_googlesync4you_calendar` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `event` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `calendar` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `type` int(2) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_googlesync4you_dis
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_googlesync4you_dis` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `event` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `type` int(2) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_googlesync4you_events
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_googlesync4you_events` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `crmid` int(11) NOT NULL, `geventid` text NOT NULL, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `eventtype` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_calendar4you_view
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_calendar4you_view` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` int(11) NOT NULL, `parent` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userid`,`type`,`parent`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_calendar4you_colors
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_calendar4you_colors` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `mode` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `entity` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `color` varchar(100) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_calendar4you_event_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_calendar4you_event_fields` ( `efid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `event` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `type` int(2) NOT NULL, `view` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`efid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0

table.name: its4you_calendar4you_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_calendar4you_settings` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `dayoftheweek` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `show_weekends` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `user_view` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_calendar4you_view
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_calendar4you_view` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` int(11) NOT NULL, `parent` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userid`,`type`,`parent`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_googlesync4you_access
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_googlesync4you_access` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `google_login` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `google_password` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `google_apikey` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `google_keyfile` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `google_clientid` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `refresh_token` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `synctoken` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `googleinsert` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `service` varchar(30) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_googlesync4you_calendar
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_googlesync4you_calendar` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `event` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `calendar` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `type` int(2) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_googlesync4you_dis
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_googlesync4you_dis` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `event` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `type` int(2) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_googlesync4you_events
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_googlesync4you_events` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `crmid` int(11) NOT NULL, `geventid` text NOT NULL, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `eventtype` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `lastmodified` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
